text: Hi all, just wondering if there's something I'm missing with the |float filter. When I attempt to convert a string, "1.414" in this case, into a float with the intention of doing math on it (for some font size calculations) it converts to "1414.0" in the EDITOR page (so in a rich text module in the editor for example) but on the published page I can clearly see it says "font-size: 1.414(rem in this case)". I need to be able to square the value so that's why I'm trying to convert it to a float
